data.title: Giving for Student Scholarships through FRCC Foundation
data.text:
Turning Student Dreams into Reality

Support from individuals and the surrounding community can make a college education more accessible for deserving students and help us turn our students' dreams into reality. We provide a variety ways for you to donate.

Support Students in Need

Make a contribution supporting the Annual Fund, General Scholarship Fund or High Needs Fund. Learn more about annual giving.

Fund a Scholarship

Establish a named or endowed scholarship benefiting FRCC students. Fund a scholarship.

Become a Part of the Summit Society

The Summit Society recognizes donors who have included the FRCC Foundation in their estate plans and creates a lasting impact for FRCC students. Get Summit Society information.

Attend an Event

Annual Golf Tournament - June 16, 2023:

Support FRCC students while enjoying a great day of golf with your community. The Foundation hosts the golf tournament every June. You can participate as an individual or through a sponsorship. Learn more about the FRCC Foundation Golf Tournament.

Interested in other ways to donate?
